message.content:
Update the UI styling in `C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Gemini 3 hack\rallycoach\src\app\practice\page.tsx` to match a premium dark/light hybrid theme. Read the file first.

CRITICAL RULES:
- DO NOT change ANY business logic, state, API calls, hooks, imports, refs, or functionality
- ONLY change CSS class strings and visual styling
- Keep ALL existing functionality working

Changes to make (CSS class replacements only):
1. All `min-h-screen bg-gray-50` → `min-h-screen app-page`
2. Header: `text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900` → `text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900` (keep)
3. Warning/error banners: `bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200` → `bg-yellow-500/10 border border-yellow-500/20`, `text-yellow-800` → `text-yellow-700`, `text-yellow-700` keep, `text-yellow-500` keep
4. Upload progress: `bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200` → `bg-primary-500/10 border border-primary-500/20`, `text-blue-800` → `text-primary-700`
5. Upload error: `bg-red-50 border border-red-200` → `bg-red-500/10 border border-red-500/20`
6. Sidebar cards: `bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm` → `bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow`
7. Drill info card: `bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm` → same as above
8. Tips card: `bg-primary-50 rounded-xl p-6` → `bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 to-primary-100/50 rounded-2xl p-6 border border-primary-100`
9. Loading skeleton: `bg-gray-50` → `app-page`, `bg-gray-200` → `bg-gray-200`

Make ALL edits using the Edit tool with exact old_string matches. DO NOT rewrite the entire file.

content.text:
Perfect! All CSS class replacements have been successfully applied. Let me create a summary of the changes made:

## Summary

I have successfully updated the UI styling in `C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Gemini 3 hack\rallycoach\src\app\practice\page.tsx` to match a premium dark/light hybrid theme. All changes were made using the Edit tool with exact CSS class string replacements only - no business logic, state management, or functionality was modified.

### Changes Applied:

1. **Main page container** (2 instances):
   - Changed `min-h-screen bg-gray-50` → `min-h-screen app-page`
   - Applied to both the main `PracticeContent` component and the `PracticeLoading` component

2. **Warning banner** (demo mode):
   - Changed `bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200` → `bg-yellow-500/10 border border-yellow-500/20`
   - Changed `text-yellow-800` → `text-yellow-700`
   - Kept `text-yellow-500` and `text-yellow-700` as specified

3. **Upload progress banner**:
   - Changed `bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200` → `bg-primary-500/10 border border-primary-500/20`
   - Changed `text-blue-800` → `text-primary-700`

4. **Upload error banner**:
   - Changed `bg-red-50 border border-red-200` → `bg-red-500/10 border border-red-500/20`
   - Kept `text-red-700` and `text-red-500` unchanged

5. **Sidebar cards** (4 instances):
   - Session Stats card
   - Current Metrics card
   - Form Score card
   - Drill info card
   - All changed from `bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm` → `bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow`

6. **Tips card**:
   - Changed `bg-primary-50 rounded-xl p-6` → `bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 to-primary-100/50 rounded-2xl p-6 border border-primary-100`

7. **Loading skeleton**:
   - Changed `bg-gray-50` → `app-page`
   - Kept `bg-gray-200` unchanged for skeleton elements

All functionality including state management, refs, hooks, API calls, and event handlers remain completely unchanged. The updated styling provides a more premium look with:
- Softer, translucent backgrounds using opacity variants
- Enhanced card borders and hover effects
- Gradient backgrounds on the tips card
- Rounded corners upgraded from `rounded-xl` to `rounded-2xl`
- Subtle transition effects on hover states
